page.title: 04PONTINS HOLIDAY VILLAGE
page.content: Pontin's Holiday Village Little Canada { One of three holiday camps on the western side of Wooton Creek, the camp caters for up to 600 people. Chalets are provided for sharing on a family and double room basis. A cooker and fridge are provided as the accomodation is self-catering. Facilities include a swimming pool (outdoor) tennis courts, bowling and putting greens, an amusement arcade, pets corner and a television room. The main entertainments area is the ballroom which has a cafe, bar, dance floor and stage. { { { { { }
